homepage.title: Hotel Services Platform
homepage.heroDescription: Access all the services available at your hotel with ease.
homepage.browseServices: Browse and book services available at your hotel

homepage.subtitle: Advanced digital solutions for guest services

hero.title: Book Hotel Services
hero.description: From laundry and transportation to housekeeping and dining - get everything you need during your hotel stay with just a few taps. Pay online or at the hotel.

services.title: Everything You Need During Your Stay
services.subtitle: Convenient, reliable services delivered right to your room or wherever you need them

laundry.title: Laundry & Dry Cleaning
laundry.description: Professional laundry services with same-day options. Wash, fold, iron - we handle it all.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: Airport transfers, city tours, car rentals. Reliable transportation at your fingertips.

housekeeping.title: Housekeeping
housekeeping.description: Extra cleaning, towel refresh, special requests. Keep your room perfect throughout your stay.

roomService.title: Room Service & Dining
roomService.description: Delicious meals delivered to your room. Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and special dietary needs.

benefits.title: Why Choose Our Services?
benefits.flexiblePaymentDesc: Pay online with card or cash at hotel checkout. No hidden fees.
benefits.fastReliableDesc: Quick response times and reliable service delivery every time.
benefits.easyBookingDesc: Book anytime, track your orders, and get real-time updates.

howItWorks.title: Book in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting the services you need has never been easier. Book, pay, and relax.

step1.title: Choose Your Service
step1.description: Browse available services, select what you need, and customize your order with special requests.

step2.title: Pay Your Way
step2.description: Choose online payment for instant confirmation or pay cash at the hotel front desk when you check out.

step3.title: Relax & Enjoy
step3.description: Track your order status in real-time and receive your service at the scheduled time. That's it!

payment.title: Payment Made Simple
payment.subtitle: Choose the payment method that works best for you

onlinePayment.title: Online Payment
onlinePayment.description: Secure card payment with instant confirmation
onlinePayment.features:
✓ Instant booking confirmation
✓ Secure SSL encryption
✓ No additional fees

cashPayment.title: Cash at Hotel
cashPayment.description: Pay when you check out - no advance payment needed
cashPayment.features:
✓ Pay at checkout
✓ Added to room bill
✓ Convenient for guests

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from guests who have used our hotel services

testimonial1.name: Sarah M., Business Traveler
testimonial1.text: The laundry service was a lifesaver during my week-long business trip. Picked up my clothes in the morning and they were back perfectly pressed by evening. Paid cash at checkout - so convenient!

testimonial2.name: Michael R., Family Vacation
testimonial2.text: Booked airport transfer for our whole family through the app. Driver was on time, vehicle was clean and comfortable. The online payment was secure and instant. Will definitely use again!

testimonial3.name: Emma L., Leisure Traveler
testimonial3.text: Room service breakfast was delivered hot and fresh right on time. The housekeeping team was amazing too - they even left little chocolates on my pillow. Cash payment at checkout was perfect for my budget.

testimonials.trustedBy: Trusted by guests at premium hotels worldwide

stats.title: Join Thousands of Happy Guests
stats.subtitle: Experience the convenience of modern hotel services

cta.title: Ready to Experience Better Hotel Stays?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of guests who have discovered the convenience of on-demand hotel services. Your next stay just got a whole lot better.
cta.footerText: No registration required • Pay your way • 100% secure

footer.description: Making hotel stays more convenient and enjoyable. Book laundry, transportation, housekeeping, and dining services with just a few taps.
footer.copyright: © 2025 QuickRoom. All rights reserved. Designed for exceptional guest experiences.
